post.summary: Create new profile import for a user.
post.description:
This will start an async operation.
- If the operation is started successfully, the response will be `202 Accepted` and the `Location` header will contain the URL to get the status of the operation.
- If the operation is not started successfully, the response will be `400 Bad Request`

get.summary: Get current status of the async profile import operation.
get.description:
This will return the status of an async operation.
- If the operation is still in progress, the response will be `202 Accepted`
- If the operation is completed successfully, the response will be `200 OK` and the `status` property will be `Completed`
- If the operation is completed with errors, the response will be `200 OK` and the `status` property will be `Failed`

post.summary:
Translates any mention-ids in a text to their human readable form. 
Translations are access restricted, if you don't have enough access
to get the name of an id, it won't be translated.

requestBody.description: The model with one property, value, which contains the text containing the mentions you're looking to translate.  Example of a text with a mention inside: `"Hello @(1|123456) can you please consider this role?"`

post.summary: Get company candidates list from search criteria
post.description:
Sample request:

    POST /v0.1/companies/1/candidates/search
    {
        "term": "candidate property value",
        "rating": 3         
        "status": 0,
        "sources": [],
        "noRecruiter": false,
        "recruiters": [],
        "states": [0],
        "pipeline": null,
        "pageAndSortBy": {
            "page": 1,
            "itemsPerPage": 15
        },
        "pipelines": []
    }

post.summary: Get company users list from search criteria
Get projects list from search criteria
post.description:
Sample request
{
    "pipelines": [4],
    "projectStates": [0],
    "PageAndSortBy": {
    "SortBy": "0",
    "SortOrder": "1",
    "Page": "1",
    "ItemsPerPage": "15",
    }
}
SortBy Parameter can be:
    CreatedDateTime=0 // Default
    Title=1
    Identifier=2
    CustomerIdentifier=3
    SeoId=4
    UpdatedDateTime=6
    LastTouchDateTime=7

remotePercentage.description: Accepts values between 0 and 100. 0 indicates that the work is to be done on site. 100 means that the position is fully remote.

publishForReal.description: Set to true if you actually want to publish the announcement to your recipients, if you are developing/testing the endpoint it should be false, then no persist will take place.

remotePercentage.description: 0 indicates that the work is to be done on site. 100 means that the position is fully remote.
